title: Stuck at loggin screen
body:
Before couple of days i was playing  this game for a few hours and it worked perfectly fine, now if i want to login it says logging on...(stuck on it no error ahead nothing). i tried a lot of ways(other  accounts with other regions).

reinstalled 2 times.
put my internet cable in diffrent contact.
reset my router.
updated all my windows updates.
change security protocol level in IE.
uncheck the box of internet protocol version 6 (TCP/IPv6).
put the 8.8.8.8 and the 8.8.4.4 in my dns of the internet protocol version 4 (TCP/IPv4), then im my cmd the ipconfig/release, ipconfig/renew, ipconfig/flushdns.
changed region (same issue).
deactivate my firewall/virusscanner.
restart computer ofcourse.
run the game at adminastrator/launch the game from the fil location.
and many more basic stuff like hitting your computer (joke).

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection is getting blocked somehow from ever reaching the authentication server, so you're kind of stuck in a loop until it times out.  You've run some pretty solid steps so far, targeting your network.   There are a few more steps that you can find through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, but I also suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  It will have some extra options like auto-configuring your firewall settings just in case.

Let me know if that helps, otherwise we'll go from there!
still have this problem and posted about this earlier, maybe i think you can try locating the problem on your end seems like a europe related problem
